txt.en: You have encountered the threatening Gaergarch the Thirsty. From the Mountains of Shadow, Gaergarch the Thirsty patrols The Wastes for food.
Gaergarch the Thirsty can be found patrolling The Wastes.\n\nYou have encountered Gaergarch the Thirsty and should defeat this beast for those who brave these harsh lands.
You have defeated Gaergarch the Thirsty.
From the Mountains of Shadow, Gaergarch the Thirsty patrols The Wastes for food.
Gaergarch the Thirsty can be found patrolling The Wastes.\n\nYou have encountered Gaergarch the Thirsty and should defeat this beast for those who brave these harsh lands.
You have slain Gaergarch the Thirsty and vanquished a threat to the safety of all those who brave The Wastes.
